returns._0: the string a allows to retrieve metadata (e.g IPFS hash)

params.moveType: the specific move that the player wants to perform
params.pawn: the index of the pawn that perform the move
params.player: the player that perform the move (0 or 1)
params.x: x coordinate to perform the move into
params.y: y coordinate to perform the move into

returns.outState: the new state once the move has been performed, reverted if the move is not possible

getMetadata().notice: Allow to retrieve the metadata of the pawn

getMoveNumber().notice: Retrieve the number of moves implemented by the pawn
